radiographic_examinations.findings: Pigtail drainage catheter in place in the right lobe, with a small residual pocket of complex fluid measuring approximately 2.4 x 4.4 x 4.0 cm. The remainder of the liver is normal with no other fluid collections, nor any evidence of bile duct dilatation. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The abscess at the time of drainage measured approximately 6.3 x 11.4 cm, indicating a reduction in size.
